snippet.title: Ovaltine Chocolate Sauce
snippet.description: Julee is the perky, quirky, dorky author of the blog, Mommy's Memorandum . She has an appetite to taste the world, meet its desserts, and tell their stories. Julee is also a writer whose work has appeared in The LA Times and Disney's Family Fun Magazine.

snippet.title: Milk Chocolate Popcorn
snippet.description: Kids of every age will love these crunchy Milk Chocolate Popcorn treats! Loaded with chocolate and peanuts, they make great snacks and stocking-stuffers.
